pli-tv-bi-vb-pd6:5.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd6:5.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo maṃsaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd6:5.5: Kassa sampannaṃ na manāpaṃ, kassa sāduṃ na ruccatī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd6:6.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd6:6.4: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo maṃsaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjissantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd6:6.5: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo maṃsaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd6:6.8: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo maṃsaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd6:6.9: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd6:6.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd6:7.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī maṃsaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya, paṭidesetabbaṃ tāya bhikkhuniyā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd6:7.2: ‘gārayhaṃ, ayye, dhammaṃ āpajjiṃ asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ, taṃ paṭidesemī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd6:8.1: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd6:9.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo gilānā honti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd6:9.4: “Pubbe mayaṃ, ayye, maṃsaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjimhā, tena no phāsu hoti;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd6:9.5: idāni pana ‘bhagavatā paṭikkhittan’ti kukkuccāyantā na viññāpema, tena no na phāsu hotī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd6:9.7: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānāya bhikkhuniyā maṃsaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjituṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd6:9.8: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd6:10.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā maṃsaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya, paṭidesetabbaṃ tāya bhikkhuniyā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd6:10.2: ‘gārayhaṃ, ayye, dhammaṃ āpajjiṃ asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ, taṃ paṭidesemī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd6:13.2: yassā vinā maṃsanā na phāsu hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd6:15.1: Agilānā attano atthāya viññāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd6:16.1: Agilānā agilānasaññā maṃsaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd6:16.2: Agilānā vematikā maṃsaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd6:16.3: Agilānā gilānasaññā maṃsaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd6:18.2: gilānāya, gilānā hutvā viññāpetvā agilānā bhuñjati, gilānāya sesakaṃ bhuñjati, ñātakānaṃ pavāritānaṃ, aññassatthāya, attano dhanena, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pd6:20.1: Uddiṭṭhā kho, ayyāyo, aṭṭha pāṭidesanīyā dhammā.
